participant_1.background:
My college courses are on philosophy and history.
I ride my bike to class since it s only a mile away.
I write short stories in my document tab with the use of a prompting app.
My newly bought laptop has a bum battery.

participant_2.background:
I live on the third floor in an apartment.
I like to cook.
I have two roomates.
I have two dogs.

content.text: I'm studying philosophy and history in college. I love to write short stories in my document tab with the use of a prompting app. What's something interesting about you?
I live on the third floor in an apartment with my two roommates and two dogs. I like to cook. Do you like to cook?
I don't cook very much, but I love to eat! I'm always looking for new recipes to try.
I'm a pretty good cook, so if you ever want some homemade food, I'm your guy.
That's so nice of you! I'll keep that in mind.
I also like to play video games. What's your favorite video game?
I like a lot of different video games, but my favorite is probably Mario Kart.
Mario Kart is a classic! I love that game.
It's so much fun to play with friends and family.
I agree. It's a great way to bond with people.
I'm glad we have a lot in common. It's always nice to meet someone new who shares your interests.
I agree. It's been nice talking to you.
